titleStmt.title: The tragedy of Orestes, vvritten by Thomas Goffe Master of Arts, and student of Christs Church in Oxford: and acted by the students of the same house
titleStmt.author: Goffe, Thomas, 1591-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] B[eale] for Richard Meighen, and are to be sold at his shop at the middle Temple-gate, neere Temple-barre in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Yale University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the middle Temple-gate, neere Temple-barre in Fleetstreet
